Of course, this trick violates every coding standard in the book. Try doing this in your company’s code and you will probably be subject to a stern telling off if not disciplinary action! .Â .Â . It’s a wonder you haven’t been fired on the spot for such irresponsible coding practice. You should be ashamed of yourself.
